name: HotelHub
0:
”Alexa, Open hotel hub”
”Alexa, ask hotel hub to give me better rates for my booking”
”Alexa, ask hotel hub to find cheaper rates for my booking”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hotel hub
Developer Terms of Use
des:
HotelHub is a hotel booking platform designed for Travel Management Companies. Highly customisable, user-friendly and mobile-compatible, HotelHub provides access to more than 2 million unique hotels worldwide, delivering policy-compliant hotel booking capabilities, anytime, anywhere.
HotelHub’s Rate Optimiser ensures business travellers never miss out on the best hotel rates. From the moment your booking is confirmed, Rate Optimiser automatically re-shops hotel prices and notifies you by email when a better rate becomes available.
Users can also track availability for specific hotels, rates and room types. 
The HotelHub skill allows users to receive and review Rate Optimiser notifications via their Alexa-enabled devices.
To get started, just say, “Alexa, open HotelHub”

Note: To use HotelHub, please make sure you have linked your MyHotelHub account.
